title: At what specific point in Order of the Phoenix did Voldemort realize he could manipulate Harry with Legilimency? - Quora
tags: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix (2007 movie)
Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix (2003 book)

response.answer_text: When Harry got the vision of Arthur Weasley being attacked. It was something to ponder upon, that how help arrived within minutes of the attack. All Voldemort needed to know was that, it was Dumbledore who sent help. And it was not really hard to know, as we very well know, that Voldemort had spies in Ministry. And how could Dumbledore know? There was only one possible answer to that. Harry. And then, every thing made sense. Voldemort worked out what Dumbledore had.

At the specific point of Mr.Weasley getting hospitalized in St. Mongos and Voldemort getting to know about the incident through his death eaters, Voldemort knew Harry could look in his mind and so decided to manipulate him.
I think Dumbledore realized it when Harry had the vision of Arthur Weasley being attacked then he told them what was happening.
